oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-06-02 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from June 2, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), George Morgan (host/performer), guest performer Jean Shepard, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Don Slayman, Lew Childre, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: George Morgan; Del Wood; Minnie Pearl; Jean Shepard; Grandpa Jones
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Steal Away (George Morgan) [continued from part 1] -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, George Morgan) -- Prince Albert jingle -- George Morgan introduces Del Wood -- Mockingbird (Del Wood) -- George Morgan introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Grant Turner) -- George Morgan introduces Jean Shepard -- You're Calling Me Sweetheart Again (Jean Shepard) -- George Morgan introduces Grandpa Jones -- Eight More Miles To Louisville (Grandpa Jones) -- Traffic safety P.S.A. (Grant Turner) -- George Morgan talks -- Take A Look At Yourself (George Morgan) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (George Morgan) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Wood, Del; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Childre, Lew, 1901-1961; Slayman, Don (Musician); Shepard, Jean, 1933-; Morgan, George, 1925-1975
